g.text: Quickly install a lightweight Kubernetes distro + plus all your apps onto it with Argo CD. Handles all the little
nuts and bolts for many common k8s apps, but also has a comprehensive config file to help you add your own apps.
Install/update extra tools such as argocd, cilium
li, helm, k9s, krew, kubectl, and more via
Run k9s as soon as this script is complete. Default: False
